title: After Dark
description: From the back When a shocking scandal exposes southern secrets...As the blazing heat of summer gives way to sultry September, a shroud of suspicion settles over the Noble's Crossing, a sleepy Alabama town. Nothing is as it seems- and never will be again. Lane Noble Graham stands accused of murdering her ex-husband...and the one man who can help, Johnny Mack Cahill vowed never return to the town that scorned him...or the woman whose love he knew he didn't deserve!
author: Beverly Barton
